siteMetadata.title: Trafikito - monitor output of any command
siteMetadata.author: Lukas Liesis

markdownRemark.excerpt: In the notifications list you can select several notifications and delete them all at once. This mass action will delete the selected notifications without modifying anything else. This action is permanent and cannot be undone. You will have to confirm deletion after clicking Delete.
markdownRemark.html:
In the notifications list you can select several notifications and delete them all at once. This mass action will delete the selected notifications without modifying anything else. This action is permanent and cannot be undone. You will have to confirm deletion after clicking Delete.

  1. Open the main menu on the top left [menu icon]
  2. Select Dashboard
  3. In the servers list find the server you want to edit and click Open next to it
  4. On the top right click Settings
  5. Make sure Notifications are expanded
  6. Use the checkbox next to the name of the notification to select the notifications to update
  7. Use mass actions above the list to turn on all selected notifications

frontmatter.title: How to change “wait before firing again” value for all notifications at once?
How to change “stay in range” value for all notifications at once?
